name: j140
description: Template engine in 140 bytes, by @jed Schmidt. Support helpers, partials and pre-compiled templates. For nodejs and the browser. Browserify-ready.
author: Charlike Mike Reagent <@tunnckoCore> (http://www.tunnckocore.tk)

scripts.build: npm run build-bundle && npm run build-standalone
scripts.build-bundle: npm run bundle && npm run bundle-uglify
scripts.build-standalone: npm run standalone && npm run standalone-uglify
